thread.title: Chandigarh girls thrash Puducherry

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Chandigarh girls thrash Puducherry
text:
Anil Datt
Ludhiana, October 2
Chandigarh overpowered Puducherry while Andhra Pradesh overwhelmed Tripura in the girls’ section on the opening day of the 66th Junior National Basketball Championship which began at the Guru Nanak Stadium here today. In the Level-2 matches today, the Chandigarh girls came out victorious 48-17 after leading 30-12 at halftime. Amrit was the star player for Chandigarh, scoring a massive 30 points, while Tanu contributed with eight points. Andhra Pradesh too wrapped up the issue comfortably, beating Tripura 40-19. Hafijunnisha and Nikitha chipped in with 18 and 10 points, respectively. Forty-eight teams in the boys’ and girls’ sections are vying for the top honours in the tournament.
